title: 2010/278/: Council Decision of 10 May 2010 appointing one German member of the European Economic and Social Committee
header:
19.5.2010 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 123/3
COUNCIL DECISION
of 10 May 2010
appointing one German member of the European Economic and Social Committee
(2010/278/EU)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 302 thereof,
Having regard to Decision 2006/524/EC, Euratom (1),
Having regard to the proposal of the German Government,
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas a member’s seat on the European Economic and Social Committee has become vacant following the end of the term of office of Mr Wilfried WOLLER,
main_body: Mr Egbert BIERMANN, Hauptvorstand IG BCE (Main Executive Board of the Industrial Union of Mining, Chemical and Energy Workers), is hereby appointed as a member of the European Economic and Social Committee for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 20 September 2010.
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 May 2010.
For the Council
The President
M. Á. MORATINOS
(1)  OJ L 207, 28.7.2006, p. 30.
